Notification

Note: The implementation demo can be found in the Navigation section. Below are more details on the apperance and the behaviour of this specific element.

Customer Information

The jobsite Wilder Ranch has just been created. Would you like to place an order?

Order

Quotation and Pricing

2311112 - Rideback Eastern River Valley You have a new quotation ready for review.

Review

Track and Trace

The delivery for Wilder Ranch Orinda is in jeopardy due to an accident on the interstate with no exit route.

Manage
View All Notifications

Dropdown

When the user clicks on the notifications icon a dropdown is presented with the top 3 notifications only and a link to view all notifications. Upon clicking the view all notifications link, the user will be taken to a full page view of their notifications.

If a user clicks on one of the specific notifications they would be taken to that specific actionable item. In this example, if a user clicks on the notification that their new location was approved, they would be taken to place an order for that new location.

The items presented in this notification dropdown should always contain an action button relevant to that specific notification - the more tailored and proactive the action can be, the better. For example, when a new location is added, it is more proactive to ask if the user would like to place an order rather than simply "view" the approved jobsite.

Dropdown Detailed

With the location being at the forefront of the experience throughout this application, the location name in each of the notifications is the element that is given more prominence.

The notification dropdown should have a maximum of 3 notifications. The notifications shown should eb those requiring the most immediate action, relative to time. Users will have the ability to view all notifications through the "View All Notifications" button.

Full Page Notification Center

When the users clicks on view all notifications they are taken to a full page notification center experience.

Users can view their notifications and "Dismiss" or take action relative to the notification.

Notifications are removed from the overall total if an action is taken or if the user dismisses the notification.
